definitions.definition: A beginner ; one who is not very familiar or experienced in a particular subject.
examples: I'm only a novice at coding, and my programs frequently have bugs that more experienced programmers would avoid.

definitions.definition: A new member of a religious order accepted on a conditional basis, prior to confirmation .

main_definition: A beginner ; one who is not very familiar or experienced in a particular subject. [from 14th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( religion ) A new member of a religious order accepted on a conditional basis, prior to confirmation . [from 14th c.]
